faqs.question: What areas do you serve?
faqs.answer: We proudly serve Prishtine, Kosovo, along with surrounding areas. Our professional services are available throughout these communities.

faqs.question: How can I contact you?
faqs.answer: You can reach us at 044177665 or email us at info@hotelxhema.com. We're available 24/7.

faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer Accommodation, Hotel Services. Contact us for a free consultation to discuss your specific needs.

faqs.question: Do you provide free estimates?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide completely free, no-obligation estimates for all our services. Contact us at 044177665 to schedule your estimate.

faqs.question: How much do your services cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies depending on the scope of work, materials needed, and specific requirements. We provide transparent, upfront pricing with no hidden fees. Contact us for a free estimate.

faqs.question: How quickly can you start a project?
faqs.answer: We offer same-day service for emergency repairs. For installations and larger projects, we typically can schedule within a few days. Call 044177665 to check current availability.
